function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of universal design in residential structures for whole-of-life-stage use","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion spread within the built environment","Mitigation":"Incorporate principles of universal design and post-COVID learnings in new residential builds","Technologies":"Universal design principles, COVID-19 related design considerations","People":"Elderly occupants, occupants of all ages","Owner":"Architects, housing designers, developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate containment space and functionality in residential buildings","Impact":"Inability to contain virus transmission and maintain normal functioning during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Design and build functional containment spaces within residential structures","Technologies":"Structural design for containment, physical barriers, practical measures for containment","People":"Occupants of residential structures","Owner":"Architects, housing designers, developers"},{"Description":"Failure to minimize the likelihood of virus transmission through structural, physical, and practical means","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission within residential spaces","Mitigation":"Adopting a design approach that minimizes virus transmission through structural, physical, and practical measures","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, surface materials, layout design","People":"Occupants of residential structures","Owner":"Architects, housing designers, developers"}]}
